titleStmt.title: Neptunus britannicus Corydonis De luctuoso Serenissimi Henrici (æternæ memoriæ) magnæ Britanniæ Principis, &c. obitu. Et felicibus Serenissimi successoris Caroli. F. Ducis Eboracensis, &c. auspicijs: queis intermixtus Serenissimi Friderici, Rhenani Principis Electoris, &c. & Serenissimæ Elizabethæ magnæ Britanniæ, &c. Infantis Hymenæus.
titleStmt.author: Gordon, Patrick, fl. 1615-1650.

titleStmt.title: Neptunus britannicus Corydonis De luctuoso Serenissimi Henrici (æternæ memoriæ) magnæ Britanniæ Principis, &c. obitu. Et felicibus Serenissimi successoris Caroli. F. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Stansby] for Iohn Budge, and are to bee solde at Britans-bursse,
